Achievements.name: Pitchbattle
Achievements.description: Bogie Sauf Private Limited was awarded as the best Startup at Pitchbattle hosted by Ahmedabad chapter of Startup Grind which world's biggest community of Entrepreneurs, founders, innovators and startups.

Achievements.name: Innopreneurs International Startup Contest (6th Edition)
Achievements.description: Bogie Sauf Private Limited has been qualified to TOP 100 startups and pitching in Innopreneurs International Startup Contest (6th Edition), India's most happening startup contest entering South Asia at Lemon Ideas Nagpur.

Achievements.name: Maker Fest Vadodara 2021
Achievements.description: Bogie Sauf Private Limited won a Platinum Award at Maker Fest Vadodara 2021 hosted by Yuvalay Electronics Lab and Vadodara Innovation Council.

Achievements.name: MAGIC's (Marathwada Accelerator for Growth & Incubation Council)
Achievements.description: Bogie Sauf Private Limited has been shortlisted for the final pitching round under MAGIC's (Marathwada Accelerator for Growth & Incubation Council) `Aatmanirbhar Bharat Innovation Challenge 2021` among 93 ideas/startups from all across India.
